name: Brownfield land
description: Plots of land that have previously been developed but are not currently in use

name: Developer contributions
description: Commitments to improving local community infrastructure such as Section 106 agreements, viability assessments, community infrastructure levies, and other planning obligations.

name: Digital Land
description: Collections, specifications, and other Digital Land project data.

name: Local plans
description: Local plans, Neighbourhood plans, and other development policies related to plan making.

name: Organisations
description: Local Planning Authorities and other organisations who keep and maintain data used by Digital Land.
